mapper.select:
select
from tb_resource a left JOIN tb_resource b on b.id=a.pid JOIN tb_role_resource rr on rr.tresource_id= a.id JOIN tb_role r on r.id= rr.trole_id JOIN tb_house_role hr on hr.trole_id= r.id JOIN tb_house h on h.id= hr.house_id. where h.token = #{token}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_resource( id, icon, name, remark, seq, url, pid, tresourcetype_id )VALUES ( #{id}, #{icon}, #{name}, #{remark}, #{seq}, #{url}, #{parent.id}, #{tResourceTypeId} )
mapper.update: UPDATE tb_resource SET icon=#{icon}, name=#{name}, remark=#{remark}, seq=#{seq}, url=#{url}, pid=#{parent.id}, tresource_id=#{tResourceTypeId} WHERE id=#{id}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM tb_resource WHERE id=#{id} OR parent_ids LIKE CONCAT('%,', #{id}, ',%')
